analysis.description:
EDUCrowdsale.token (/unique_contracts/0x94d313feaee495466a23d97c87690ae33c0f0af6.sol#741-742) shadows:
	- Crowdsale.token (/unique_contracts/0x94d313feaee495466a23d97c87690ae33c0f0af6.sol#14-16)

Reentrancy in EDUToken.delayedTransferFrom (/unique_contracts/0x94d313feaee495466a23d97c87690ae33c0f0af6.sol):
	External calls:
	- transferFrom(_tokenWallet,_to,_value) (/unique_contracts/0x94d313feaee495466a23d97c87690ae33c0f0af6.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- kycPending (/unique_contracts/0x94d313feaee495466a23d97c87690ae33c0f0af6.sol)

Reentrancy in KYCToken.isKnownCustomer (/unique_contracts/0x94d313feaee495466a23d97c87690ae33c0f0af6.sol#338-345):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(! kycPending[_address] || certifier.certified(_address)) (/unique_contracts/0x94d313feaee495466a23d97c87690ae33c0f0af6.sol#339-341)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- kycPending (/unique_contracts/0x94d313feaee495466a23d97c87690ae33c0f0af6.sol#343-344)

Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_contracts/0x94d313feaee495466a23d97c87690ae33c0f0af6.sol#118-122) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_contracts/0x94d313feaee495466a23d97c87690ae33c0f0af6.sol#122)

AllowanceCrowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_contracts/0x94d313feaee495466a23d97c87690ae33c0f0af6.sol#392-399) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(tokenWallet,_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_contracts/0x94d313feaee495466a23d97c87690ae33c0f0af6.sol#397-398)

EDUCrowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_contracts/0x94d313feaee495466a23d97c87690ae33c0f0af6.sol#756-762) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(tokenWallet,_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_contracts/0x94d313feaee495466a23d97c87690ae33c0f0af6.sol#758-760)
	-token.delayedTransferFrom(tokenWallet,_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_contracts/0x94d313feaee495466a23d97c87690ae33c0f0af6.sol#760-761)

TimedCrowdsale.TimedCrowdsale (/unique_contracts/0x94d313feaee495466a23d97c87690ae33c0f0af6.sol#701-711) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_contracts/0x94d313feaee495466a23d97c87690ae33c0f0af6.sol#705)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_contracts/0x94d313feaee495466a23d97c87690ae33c0f0af6.sol#715-719) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTime (/unique_contracts/0x94d313feaee495466a23d97c87690ae33c0f0af6.sol#716-719)

EDUCrowdsale.getCurrentRate (/unique_contracts/0x94d313feaee495466a23d97c87690ae33c0f0af6.sol#770-782) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < 1529928000 (/unique_contracts/0x94d313feaee495466a23d97c87690ae33c0f0af6.sol#779-782)
	- block.timestamp < 1529323200 (/unique_contracts/0x94d313feaee495466a23d97c87690ae33c0f0af6.sol#776-782)
	- block.timestamp < 1528718400 (/unique_contracts/0x94d313feaee495466a23d97c87690ae33c0f0af6.sol#775-782)
	- block.timestamp < 1528156799 (/unique_contracts/0x94d313feaee495466a23d97c87690ae33c0f0af6.sol#772-782)
